moves.1. e4: My best ever miniature game to date.
moves.3. d4: I like to play openly hence this central thrust.
moves.4... Ne4 5. Bd3: Developing my bishop and preparing to castle.  I was expecting black to play 5.  d5 here.
moves.6. c3: Might as well sac another pawn.
moves.8. Bxb2 Nc5 9. Nc3: Completing my development of my minor pieces.
moves.9... Nxd3: Black takes my light squared bishop.
moves.10... O-O: I really like my position here.  Lots of open lines and no defenders near my opponent's king!
moves.13. exf6 h6: Trying to prevent 14. Ng5 threatening mate.
moves.14... hxg5 15. Qf5: Now the threat is Qxg5+ and mate on g7.
moves.16. f4: Threatening Qxg5 again and clearing a path for my rook to come to f3 and h3.
moves.18. Rxf4: Another sacrifice to clear the way for a final attack.
moves.18... Kh8: Hoping to allow Rg8 but it's too late.
moves.19. Qxg5: The final position.  Nothing black can do to stop Rxh4 mate and Qg7 mate is also threatened.  Hope you enjoyed!
